IssueCategory.Name: Change Request
IssueCategory.Description: Any completely new requirements need to be recorded as part of this group.

IssueCategory.Name: Cost Saving - (Currency)
IssueCategory.Description: Provide details in (currency) of potential cost savings

IssueCategory.Name: General Issue
IssueCategory.Description: Record any other issues (anything not covered by the other issue categories)

IssueCategory.Name: Improvement Suggestion
IssueCategory.Description: Record any issues considered to be relevant to management or to be resolved by management as part of this group.

IssueCategory.Name: Management Issue
IssueCategory.Description: Record any changes as part of this group - changes could be process changes, updates, errors, revisions to supporting documentation

IssueCategory.Name: Question
IssueCategory.Description: Any questions which are to be resolved should be recorded here
